identity.name: SalesGenius
identity.vibe: Elite Athleticism for Business. High precision, high contrast.

gradients.hero_glow: background: radial-gradient(circle at center, rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.15) 0%, rgba(2, 6, 23, 0) 70%);
gradients.subtle_mesh: background-image: radial-gradient(at 27% 37%, hsla(215, 98%, 61%, 0.1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 97% 21%, hsla(24, 94%, 50%, 0.1) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 52% 99%, hsla(354, 98%, 61%, 0.1) 0px, transparent 50%);

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6
dashboard_grid.rules: Every pixel utilized. Use h-full on children. No jagged bottoms.

marketing_grid.rules: Mix Hero (col-span-8), Square (col-span-4), and Tall (row-span-2) shapes.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-semibold transition-all duration-200 active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground font-medium

cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors
cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-white/10 bg-slate-900/50 p-8 hover:bg-slate-900/80 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

hero_background.usage: Use with heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-950/90) for text readability

team_collaboration.usage: Use in 'The Square' or 'The Hero' grid slot

accessibility_rules: Text contrast must be at least 4.5:1 for normal text.
Interactive elements must have focus states (ring-2 ring-primary).
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + text).
All images must have descriptive alt text.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Do not use purple/teal gradients. Stick to Orange/Slate.
Dark mode is NOT just black. Use 'slate-950' and 'slate-900'.
Dashboard cards should have a subtle border in light mode, but rely on bg color difference in dark mode.
Widget Configurator: Split screen layout. Left: Controls (Scrollable), Right: Live Preview (Sticky).
